snippet: A photographic exhibition in Washington curates cool in America, with 100 cultural icons on display, and an alternate list of 100 who didn’t make the cut.
abstract: National Portrait Gallery in Washington, DC, is showing exhibit American Cool, which features photographs of 100 cultural icons spanning many decades.
lead_paragraph: A photographic exhibition in Washington curates cool in America, with 100 cultural icons on display, and an alternate list of 100 who didn’t make the cut.

headline.main: In Washington, 100 Examples of the Epitome of Cool
headline.print_headline: In Washington, 100 Examples of the Epitome of Cool
